alert.note: Alert for Dunn; McKenzie; Mountrail; Williams (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 7:38PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTH CENTRAL DUNN, NORTHEASTERN MCKENZIE, SOUTHEASTERN WILLIAMS AND SOUTHWESTERN MOUNTRAIL COUNTIES THROUGH 815 PM CDT... At 737 PM CDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 16 miles southwest of Ross to 10 miles west of 4 Bears Lodge to 11 miles northwest of Mandaree. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... 4 Bears Lodge and Mandaree around 755 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include New Town. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If on or near Central Lake Sakakawea, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern and northwestern North Dakota.
